titleStmt.title: A call out of Egypt, (where death and darkness is) into the glorious light and liberty of the sons of God, (where life and peace is.) The Lord fulfilling his promises declared by his holy prophets and Apostles, in these later dayes.
titleStmt.author: Parker, Alexander, 1628-1689.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Giles Calvert at the Black Spread Eagle neer the west end of Pauls.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Black Spread Eagle neer the west end of Pauls.
